ygData.subject: Re: Getting Cash
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... Have you warrior friend tank wisps and you blast them to smithereens with shocks. Fast easy money. Started doing it with a necro friend at 8th
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 12 May 1999 19:24:30 -0400, you wrote:

>From: "Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson" <ldyiggie@...>
>
>I don't know about others, but I haven't found a ready source for cash that I can
<snip>
>getting cash will be easier at higher levels.
>
>Iggie
>Level 10 Gnome Wizard
>Cazic-Thule

Have you warrior friend tank wisps and you blast them to smithereens
with shocks. Fast easy money. Started doing it with a necro friend at
8th and we still do it when we need quick cash. Adding a cleric to the
mix would make it much faster too but then you'd have to split one
more way.

Hope that helps.

Dayne D'Gorith, Teir'dal Faern of house D'Gorith
and Guild Har'oloth on the Karana Server
www.drow.net
